name: Salsa Verde Mayonnaise
author: Daylesford
ingredients:
- 40g fresh parsley leaves, roughly chopped
- 20g fresh mint leaves, roughly chopped
- 30g rocket leaves, roughly chopped
- 1 clove garlic, roughly chopped
- 3 tbsp capers
- 4 heaped tsp Dijon mustard
- 160ml olive oil
- 4 anchovy fillets
- 160ml mayonnaise
instructions:
- Mix all the ingredients apart from the mayonnaise in a bowl and leave to stand for 10 minutes to allow the flavours to infuse.
- Blend to a coarse paste (or use a pestle and mortar).
- Put the mayonnaise into another bowl and slowly whisk in the blended herb mixture, a little at a time. Do this slowly, to avoid the mayonnaise separating.
- Chill in the fridge until needed, it will keep for up to a week.
